info.description: RESTful API for managing users, contacts, and addresses with clean architecture principles.
info.title: Golang Clean Architecture API

get.description: Search and list contacts for the authenticated user with pagination

post.description: Create a new contact for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific contact by ID for the authenticated user

put.description: Update a specific contact by ID for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete a specific contact by ID for the authenticated user

get.description: Get all addresses for a specific contact

post.description: Create a new address for a specific contact

get.description: Get a specific address by ID for a contact

put.description: Update a specific address by ID for a contact

delete.description: Delete a specific address by ID for a contact

post.description: Create a new user account with ID, name, and password

delete.description: Logout the currently authenticated user and invalidate token

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information

patch.description: Update the currently authenticated user's information (name and/or password)

post.description: Authenticate user and receive access token
Get a new access token using a valid refresh token

BearerAuth.description: API token authentication. Format: your-token-here (without "Bearer" prefix)
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
